double coefficient for species compatibility based on common genes; see section 3.3 of primary NEAT paper for details.

getSpeciationThreshold

public double getSpeciationThreshold()
Returns:
threshold below which the difference between 2 chromosomes dictates they are in the same species; see section 3.3 of primary NEAT paper for details.

setSpeciationThreshold

public void setSpeciationThreshold(double d)
Parameters:
d - threshold below which the difference between 2 chromosomes dictates they are in the same species; see section 3.3 of primary NEAT paper for details.

getSpeciationTarget

public int getSpeciationTarget()
Returns:
target number of species to try and maintain by altering speciation threshold.

setSpeciationTarget

public void setSpeciationTarget(int d)
Parameters:
d - target number of species to try and maintain by altering speciation threshold.

getSpeciationThresholdChange

public double getSpeciationThresholdChange()
Returns:
amount to change speciation threshold to maintain speciation target.

setSpeciationThresholdChange

public void setSpeciationThresholdChange(double d)
Parameters:
d - amount to change speciation threshold to maintain speciation target.
